department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.ch: 在這個課程中，我們將探討嵌入式系統的硬體和韌體設計的方法和技術。包括嵌入式處理器的選擇，硬體/韌體切割，周邊驅，系統架構，開發工具，嵌入式軟體設計等課題。本課程以ARM Cortex-M7微處理器架構為基礎，STM32H743 MCU作為實驗平台，透過實驗，進行進行各種周邊的驅動和嵌入式中介軟體開發實作，讓學生深入了解嵌入式系統設計方法論和系統實作流程。
goal.en: "In this course, we will explore the methods and techniques of hardware and firmware design for embedded systems. Including the selection of embedded processors, hardware / firmware cutting, peripheral drives, system architecture, development tools, embedded software design and other topics. This course is based on the ARM Cortex-M7 microprocessor architecture, and the STM32H743 MCU is used as an experimental platform. Through experiments, various peripheral drivers and embedded intermediary software development and implementation are conducted, allowing students to understand the embedded system design methodology and system implementation Workflow."

outline.ch:
"1.嵌入式系統設計方法論簡介
2.嵌入式系統架構設計
3.嵌入式系統離散事件建模
4.嵌入式軟體高階合成
5.DIO_AIO
6.UART_I2C_SPI通訊介面
7.Timer_Counter_PWM
8.應用周邊1_九軸感測器MPU9255_加速計_陀螺儀_磁力計
9.應用周邊2_Touch LCD
10.應用周邊3_VL53L0X距離感測與LiDAR
11.藍牙_麥克風_溫溼度
12.嵌入式視覺系統開發
13.嵌入式神經網路
14.期末專題：架構設計
15.期末專題：離散事件建模
16.期末專題：高階合成與軟硬體整合驗證"
outline.en:
"1.Introduction to Embedded System Design Methodology
2. Embedded system architecture design
3. Discrete Event Modeling of Embedded Systems
4. Embedded software advanced synthesis
5.DIO_AIO
6.UART_I2C_SPI communication interface
7.Timer_Counter_PWM
8. Application Peripheral 1_Nine-axis Sensor MPU9255_Accelerometer_Gyroscope_Magnetometer
9. Application peripheral 2_Touch LCD
10. Application peripheral 3_VL53L0X distance sensing and LiDAR
11.Bluetooth_microphone_temperature and humidity
12. Embedded vision system development
13. Embedded Neural Network
14. Closing Topic: Architecture Design
15. Closing Topic: Discrete Event Modeling
16. End-of-Term Topic: High-Level Synthesis and Software and Hardware Integration Verification"

textbook.ch: "Frank Vahid and Tony Givargis, Embedded System Design: A Unified Hardware/Software Introduction, John Wiley & Sons, 2002."
